org.springframework.test.context

注释类型 BootstrapWith


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Inherited
public @interface BootstrapWith
    @BootstrapWith defines class-level metadata that is used to determine how to bootstrap the Spring TestContext Framework.

    This annotation may also be used as a meta-annotation to create custom composed annotations.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
    另请参阅:
    BootstrapContext, TestContextBootstrapper

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      Class<? extends TestContextBootstrapper> value
      The TestContextBootstrapper to use to bootstrap the Spring TestContext Framework.

    • 元素详细资料

      • value

        public abstract Class<? extends TestContextBootstrapper> value
        The TestContextBootstrapper to use to bootstrap the Spring TestContext Framework.
        默认值:
        org.springframework.test.context.TestContextBootstrapper.class
